name: Outbreak: the Root of the Problem
name_original: Outbreak: the Root of the Problem
description:
Made for the 2023 Global Game Jam by Chandler Smith! https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/outbreak-root-problem-1

It is now your job to stop the spread of a global zombie virus! To complete this task, you'll need to find a cure coming from the root of the problem: zombie DNA. Using your limited resources, find a way to create a cure in one of three difficulties, or build your own difficulty, and play however you like!
